definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: Point 6 demanded the evacuation of Russia by German forces and self-determination for the Russian peoples.
sentences.chinese: 第六點要求德軍撤出俄國，並讓俄羅斯各民族自決。

sentences.english: However if national self-determination is exaggerated, it will result in race discrimination and ethnic slaughter.
sentences.chinese: 但過分誇大民族自決，又會導致種族歧視乃至仇殺。

sentences.english: This lack of self determination has applied to the region's economy as well.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區的經濟同樣缺乏民族自決的意識。
